boardgame.name: Java
boardgame.description: Java is a fascinating island with great potential for development _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; especially the undeveloped area of central Java with its fertile soil and rich natural resources. These riches are much desired by the rulers of the regions that surround central Java. Each player, as one of the Javanese rulers, tries to develop the region for themselves. Each wants to bring their culture and control to these undeveloped areas. The players irrigate the land and cultivate new rice fields; they build villages and palaces, and create cities from the villages._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player desires to be the dominant force in the development of this new area. Players earn fame points for building and enlarging palaces, for creating irrigation systems, and for arranging palace festivals. The player with the most fame points after the final scoring wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Java is the second game of the Mask Trilogy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

never played +++++ german version, but you can find rules and card translations on boardgamegeek and game parts are almost completely language independent +++++ will be shipped with insurance +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-countries : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), pleask at for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be recieved within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. Unopened merchandise may be returned within 14 days of purchase for a full refund, less original shipping charges. Return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer with the exception of defective merchandise. To return an item, please contact us prior to sending an item back to us. WA orders pay 8.4% sales tax. Please email us with any questions. Thanks Chum Chum Games customerservice@chumchumgames.com www.alwaysgreatgames.com

This is a complete copy of the Ravensburger version of Java. It is the German language version, but there is no text at all on the pieces. Only the rulebook is in German, and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll include a printout of the rules in English. All the pieces are punched and bagged. All the parts (cardboard fields and palaces, player aids, wooden pieces, cards, rulebook, and board) are in excellent condition. The top of the box has a ~2 inch light crease on one side, probably from the game I had stacked on top of it. The bottom of the box shows very slight wear in the corners. Shipping for this game will be based on your location. As a rough guide, shipping within the US will likely be at most $13 (for parcel post) or $19 (for priority mail). Note that I do reduce shipping charges if you buy more than one of my games -- Send me a message and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll calculate the discount. (I charge an estimate of the actual shipping cost.)

Comments: Condition Notes: Played once and in good shape. Shipping Notes: You are welcome to come to Community Game Night (see http://www.boardgamegeek.com/thread/127654) and pick up your game in person and pay $0.00 for shipping. Otherwise--Yes, I will gladly combine orders to reduce your per item shipping costs. (To see other items to add to your order see http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geekstore.php3?action=viewuser_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;username=RoamDog). Please provide a contact phone number--this is ONLY in case there are shipping issues--I am NOT planning to call you. Also, if you would like tracking information, also provide a direct/external (non-BGG) email address. Finally, if at all possible, please provide a business (rather than a residential) address and let me know that the address you are providing is a business address (this will expedite delivery). Payment Notes: Preferred method of payment for all transactions is for me to receive an Amazon gift certificate from you (see https://www.amazon.com/gp/gc/order-email?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ref_=gc_lp_4ways_email_white). US buyers: Preferred method of payment for all transactions is for me to receive an Amazon gift certificate from you. USPS money order is a good second choice. Western Union transfer is also acceptable. If you (the receiver) elects to not pay extra for insurance (totally up to the receiver) then the receiver agrees to assume responsibility for lost or damaged packages (I cannot remember ever having a problem, but the risk is there). Non-US buyers: Gift certificate from Amazon (see https://www.amazon.com/gp/gc/order-email?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ref_=gc_lp_4ways_email_white) and Western Union wire transfer (see www.westernunion.com) are the only acceptable form of payment. Must be in US dollars and you pay any fees. Non-US buyers--Please also note that the shipping charge will be outrageously high. Probably high enough that it does not make sense to purchase this item from me. I have no control over this. Insurance will also be REQUIRED (at receiver_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s expense) for shipments to non-US addresses. Receivers outside the US must also agree to assume ALL responsibility for taxes, tariffs, customs duties, etc. If these terms are not acceptable, please do not order from me. **Note that the offered price is the discounted price for a cash (cash, money order, Amazon Gift Card, western union) payment.
